randnames.randnames.first_name(year: Optional[int] = None, sex: Optional[str] = None) → str¶

First name Draw firest name for a given year and gender. By default year and sex are chosen randomly

Parameters

  • year (int, optional) – [description], defaults to None

  • sex (str, optional) – [description], defaults to None

Raises

  • YearNotInRange – [description]

  • InvalidSexArgument – [description]

Returns

first name

Return type

str

>>> first_name()
'Jillian'
randnames.randnames.full_name(year: Optional[int] = None, sex: Optional[str] = None) → str¶

Full name Return full name for a given year an gender. By default yera and sex are chosen randomly.

Parameters

  • year (int, optional) – [description], defaults to None

  • sex (str, optional) – [description], defaults to None

Returns

[description]

Return type

str

>>> full_name()
'Jillian Mongillo'
randnames.randnames.last_name(year: Optional[int] = None) → str¶

Last Name Draw last name for a given year

Parameters

year (int, optional) – year as int to draw last name from that year database, defaults to None

Raises

YearNotInRange – if year is not in propper range, currently (1990, 2010)

Returns

last name

Return type

str

>>> last_name()
'Mongillo'
